XXjnalokau:2: namo buddhāya // evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
XXjnalokau:3: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate 'nantaratnaśikhare dharmadhātugarbhe prāsāde mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcaviṃśatibhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ /
XXjnalokau:4: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptaiḥ /
XXjnalokau:7: dhanaśriyā ca buddhiśriyā ca bhaiṣajyarājena ca bhaiṣajyasamudgatena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXjnalokau:16: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavata etad abhūt /
XXjnalokau:17: yan nv ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahājavabalavegasthāmasaṃjananārthaṃ dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayeyam, yad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo lokadhātubhyo
XXjnalokau:19: yan nv ahaṃ mahādharmanirdeśasya paridīpanāyai nimittam ādarśayeyam, mahāntam avabhāsaṃ kuryām
XXjnalokau:20: yan me bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgatya mahādharmanirdeśaṃ paripṛccheyur iti /
XXjnalokau:21: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyācintyatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamaṃ lokadhātuṃ mahāraśmimeghair avabhāsayati sma /
XXjnalokau:22: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasmād digbhāgād daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgacchanti sma /
XXjnalokau:25: acintyāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakapraṇidhānabalanirjāteṣu padmāsaneṣu bhagavataḥ purato nyaṣīdan
XXjnalokau:29: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmadhātugarbhe prāsādamadhye mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt
XXjnalokau:36: tasya ca mahāmaṇiratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsanasyopari samantād daśāsaṃkhyeyāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
XXjnalokau:37: te ca raśmayo daśasu dikṣv anyonyān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
XXjnalokau:38: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśadiśy ekaikasmād digbhāgād daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaśakrabrahmalokapālā āgacchanti sma /
XXjnalokau:42: kecid muktāmayaiḥ, kecid vajramayaiḥ, kecid vajraprabhāsamaṇiratnamayaiḥ,
XXjnalokau:45: kecic cintāmaṇiratnamayaiḥ, kecic chakrābhilagnamaṇiratnamayaiḥ, kecit sāgarapratiṣṭhānaviśuddharatnavyūhasamantaraśmiprabhāmaṇimahāratnamayakūṭāgāraniṣaṇṇāsaṃkhyeyācintyāpsaraḥkoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasaṃgītisaṃpravāditair āgacchanti sma /
XXjnalokau:46: āgatya ca bhagavato 'cintyātulyāmāpyāṃ parimāṇābhikrāntāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, ekānte svapraṇidhānanirjāteṣv āsaneṣu niṣīdanti sma /
XXjnalokau:47: niṣīdya bhagavantam animiṣaṃ nirīkṣantaḥ sthitā abhūvan /
XXjnalokau:48: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
XXjnalokau:55: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tato mahāmaṇiratnapadmagarbhāt siṃhāsanād imā gāthā niścaranti sma
XXjnalokau:56: āgaccha niṣīda narendrarājā ahaṃ hi te puṇyabalena udgataḥ /
XXjnalokau:57: saṃpūrṇasaṃkalpa ahaṃ tvam adya saṃdhārayiṣye dvipadottamaṃ jinam // 1 //
XXjnalokau:58: mamātmabhāvo ratanāmayo hy ayaṃ ratnaikapadmaṃ mama madhyasaṃsthitam /
XXjnalokau:59: manoramaṃ tubhya kṛtena nāyakāḥ saṃkalpa pūrehi mamādya tāyinaḥ // 2 //
XXjnalokau:60: niṣadya ratnāmayi padmi asmiṃ śobhehi māṃ sarvam imaṃ ca lokam /
XXjnalokau:61: deśehi dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ yaṃ śruta siṃhāsana īdṛśaṃ labhet // 3 //
XXjnalokau:62: raśmī sahasrā tava gātrasaṃbhavāḥ prabhāsayanto bahulokadhātum /
XXjnalokau:63: prāmodyajātasya hi lakṣaṇaṃ imaṃ samākramā mahya kṛtena nāyakāḥ // 4 //
XXjnalokau:64: kṣipraṃ niṣīdasva kuruṣva 'nugrahaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā dhārita aṣṭakoṭiyaḥ /
XXjnalokau:65: asmin pradeśe munināṃ svayaṃbhuvāṃ bhagavan pīhādya karotv anugraham // 5
XXjnalokau:68: atha khalu bhagavān utthāya pūrvakād āsanāt tatra mahāratnapadmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣadya paryaṅkaṃbaddhī sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ svavalokayati sma /
XXjnalokau:69: sāmutkarṣikāyāś ca dharmadeśanāyās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nimittam akārṣīt /
XXjnalokau:70: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa evaṃ cintayati sma /
XXjnalokau:71: yan nv ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'nutpādānirodhaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛcchet, ciraśruto 'yam asmābhir dharmaparyāya iti /
XXjnalokau:72: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato 'ntikān nimittaṃ viditvā teṣāṃ
XXjnalokau:73: ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya bhagavantam etad avocat
XXjnalokau:81: samāgateme bahubodhisattvā jñānārthinaḥ tvāṃ ca vibho 'bhivanditum /
XXjnalokau:82: saṃpreṣitā lokavināyakebhir deśehi saddharmam udāram uttamam // 3 //
XXjnalokau:85: evam ukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat /
XXjnalokau:86: sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ, sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ mañjuśrīs tathāgatam etam arthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
XXjnalokau:87: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ caitarhy āgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhabhūmiprāpaṇārtham anuttrāsas te mañjuśrīr asmin sthāne yogaḥ karaṇīyo na (JĀA 26) bhayaṃ na stambhitatvam /
XXjnalokau:92: tadyathā mañjuśrīr iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī mahāvaiḍūryamayī saṃsthitā bhavet /
XXjnalokau:93: evaṃ ca saṃsthitā bhaved yathā tasyāṃ vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ trayastriṃśadbhavanasya,
XXjnalokau:94: śakrasya devānām indrasya, vaijayantasya ca prāsādasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyet /
XXjnalokau:95: śakraś ca devānām indras tatra divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayan saṃdṛśyet
XXjnalokau:96: atha tasmin samaye devāḥ sarvajambūdvīpakāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ saṃcodayeyuḥ /
XXjnalokau:98: paśyatemaṃ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ vaijayante prāsāde divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍantaṃ ramantaṃ paricārayantam /
XXjnalokau:102: īdṛśeṣu vaijayanteṣu prāsādeṣu krīḍiṣyatha ramiṣyatha paricārayiṣyatha śakratvāni ca kariṣyatha
XXjnalokau:104: yādṛśyā ca śakro devānām indro divyaiḥ paribhogaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūta iti /
XXjnalokau:105: atha mañjuśrīs te strīpuruṣadārakadārikās tasyāṃ vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ trayastriṃśadbhavanasya, vaijayantasya prāsādasya, śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvāñjalipragṛhaṃ kuryuḥ puṣpāṇi ca kṣiperan (JĀA 27) gandhāṃś ca kṣiperann evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣante /
XXjnalokau:106: vayam apy evaṃrūpā bhavema yādṛśaḥ śakro devānām indraḥ, vayam apy evaṃ vaijayante prāsāde krīḍema ramema parivārayema yathāyaṃ śakro devānām indra iti /
XXjnalokau:107: na ca te sattvā evaṃ saṃjānanti sma /
XXjnalokau:108: pratibhāso 'yaṃ vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ yatra trayastriṃśadbhavanam, vaijayantaś ca prāsādaḥ, śakraś ca devānām indraḥ pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyata iti /
XXjnalokau:109: te śakratvam abhinandanto dānāni ca dadati, puṇyāni ca kurvanti,
XXjnalokau:111: tatra ca trayastriṃśadbhavane pratibhāsa upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayanti /
XXjnalokau:112: yathā mañjuśrīḥ tatra ca vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ nāsti tatra trayastriṃśadbhavanam, na vaijayantaś ca prāsādaḥ, na ca śakro devānām indraḥ /
XXjnalokau:113: api tu pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya saṃdṛśyate trayastriṃśadbhavanam, vaijayantaś ca prāsādaḥ, śakrasya devānām indraḥ /
XXjnalokau:114: sa cāsan notpanno na niruddhaḥ pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
XXjnalokau:115: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ pariśuddhatvāc cittasya subhāvitatvād bhāvanāyāḥ sattvānāṃ tathāgatātmabhāvadarśanaṃ bhavati /
XXjnalokau:117: sa cābhūto 'nutpanno 'niruddho na bhāvo nābhāvo na dṛśyo nādṛśyo na lokyo nālokyo na caityo nācaityo na san nāsan
XXjnalokau:118: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvās tathāgatapratibhāsam ārambaṇīkṛtvā puṣpāṇi
XXjnalokau:119: kṣipanti, gandhān vastrāṇi ratnāni ca kṣipanti /
XXjnalokau:121: vayam apy evaṃrūpā bhavema yādṛśas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
XXjnalokau:122: te buddhajñānābhilāṣiṇo dānāni ca dadati, puṇyāni ca kurvanti, śīlaṃ ca samādāya vartante
XXjnalokau:125: tadyathā mañjuśrīs tatra mahāvaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāso neñjati, na manyate, na
XXjnalokau:130: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho neñjati, na manyate, na
XXjnalokau:136: atha ca pratibimba iva lokeṣu dṛśyate /
XXjnalokau:141: yathāśayena triyānam iti saṃjānanti, yathāśayena cādhimucyante //
XXjnalokau:144: tadyathā mañjuśrīr devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ puṇyabalapariniṣpannānāṃ dharmaśabdānāṃ mahādharmadundubhir upari vaijayantasya prasādasyāntarīkṣagatā cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntā, adṛśyā, anālokyā sarvadevaputraiḥ atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhiḥ /
XXjnalokau:145: yasmin (JĀA 29) samaye devās trayastriṃśatkāyikā tīvrasatatasamitaṃ divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ pramattā bhavanti, na bhūyaḥ sudharmāyāṃ
XXjnalokau:146: devasabhāyāṃ praviśya dharmaṃ saṃgāyanti, śakraś ca yadā devānām indro divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍaratiparibhogaiḥ pramatto bhavati, na dharmāsane niṣadya
XXjnalokau:148: tasmin samaye mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhir adṛṣyā cānālokyā cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntāntarīkṣagatā tādṛśaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ niścārayati /
XXjnalokau:149: yena ca dharmaśabdena sarvān trayastriṃśatkāyikān devān svareṇa vijñapayati /
XXjnalokau:150: anityā mārṣā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā mā pramattacāriṇo bhavatha /
XXjnalokau:152: duḥkhā mārṣāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, anātmano mārṣāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, śūnyā mārṣāḥ sarvasaṃskārā
XXjnalokau:154: duḥkham itaś cyavitānāṃ punar atropapattir bhaviṣyati /
XXjnalokau:155: saṃgāyata mārṣā dharmam, dharmārāmaratiratā bhavatha dharmasārāḥ, dharmanimnāḥ, dharmapravaṇāḥ, dharmānusmṛtimanasikārāḥ /
XXjnalokau:156: mārṣā viharatha yūyaṃ punar ebhir evaṃ divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ,
XXjnalokau:158: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena tasyā adṛśyā arūpiṇyā akalpyāyā avikalpāyāś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntāyā anutpannāniruddhāyā vākpathasamatikrāntāyāś cittamanovijñānāpagatāyā mahādharmadundubheḥ śabdena sarve trayastriṃśatkāyikā devāḥ saṃcoditā bhītās trastā udvignodvignāḥ (JĀA 30) sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ praviśya
XXjnalokau:163: śakraś ca devānām indras tasmin samaye sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ praviśya dharmāsane niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayati /
XXjnalokau:164: yadā ca mañjuśrīr asurā devaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayanti /
XXjnalokau:165: tatra yadā trayastriṃśā devāḥ parābhavaṃ gacchanti /
XXjnalokau:167: yena śabdenāsurā bhītās trastā udvignodvignāḥ palāyanti /
XXjnalokau:168: na ca mañjuśrīs tasyā mahādharmadundubheḥ kaścit saṃpādayitā vātmabhāvo vā saṃvidyate /
XXjnalokau:170: atha ca mañjuśrīs trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvaparikarmakṛtānāṃ mahādharmadundubheḥ śabdo niścarati /
XXjnalokau:174: cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaḥ, pūrvakarmavipākena trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye śabdo niścarati /
XXjnalokau:176: sa ca dharmaśabdas trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
XXjnalokau:180: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ pūrvakarmavipākena yathāśayādhimuktyā dharmaśabdaṃ niścarantaṃ saṃjānanti
XXjnalokau:181: sa ca dharmaśabdaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
XXjnalokau:182: dharmasvaranirghoṣeṇa tathāgataghoṣasvara iti loke saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
XXjnalokau:183: nāsti ca mañjuśrīs tathāgataḥ, atha ca dharmasvaraghoṣeṇa tathāgata iti prajñaptir loke saṃbhavati /
XXjnalokau:184: sattvānām eva pūrvakuśalakarmavipākena tathāgataśabdaṃ niścarantaṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
XXjnalokau:185: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhajananārthaṃ pramattānāṃ ca saṃcodanārthaṃ śabdo niścarati /
XXjnalokau:186: te mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā tathāgataṃ saṃkalpayanti /
XXjnalokau:188: ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca tathāgatārambaṇakuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ tathāgatavāk śrūyate /
XXjnalokau:189: api tv anutpanno 'niruddho mañjuśrīs tathāgato veditavyaḥ //
XXjnalokau:192: tadyathā mañjuśrīr nidāghakālāvasāne varṣāṇāṃ prathame māsy āgate sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākena pṛthivīgatānāṃ bījagrāmabhūtagrāmasya sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ saṃjananārtham upari vaihāyasy āntarīkṣa ākāśe tādṛśā vāyavo vānti /
XXjnalokau:195: tena ca sarvī mahāpṛthivī saṃtarpitā bhavati /
XXjnalokau:196: sarve jambūdvīpakāś ca sattvās tasmin samaye pramuditā bhavanti /
XXjnalokau:199: yasmin khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samaya upary antarīkṣād mahān udakaskandho na
XXjnalokau:200: nipatati, tasmin samaye sarvajambūdvīpakāḥ sattvā evaṃ cintayanti /
XXjnalokau:202: yadā tu mañjuśrīr upary antarīkṣād mahān vāriskandho mahāpṛthivyāṃ nipatati, sattvā evaṃ vadanti
XXjnalokau:203: aho mahāmegho vāri pramuñcati saṃtarpayati mahāpṛthivīm iti /
XXjnalokau:204: na punar atra mañjuśrīr megho vā meghaprajñaptir vā vidyate /
XXjnalokau:205: vātasaṃjanito mañjuśrīr upary antarīkṣād mahān udakaskandho nipatati /
XXjnalokau:208: yathā mañjuśrīs tasya vāriskandhasyopary antarīkṣe vātasaṃkṣobheṇa saṃvāryamāṇasya muñcato vāri megha iti prajñaptir bhavati /
XXjnalokau:210: na punar atra mañjuśrīr meghaḥ saṃvidyate, na meghaprajñaptiḥ /
XXjnalokau:212: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ pūrvakuśalamūlasaṃbhāropacitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhajñānābhiprāyāṇām avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ nirvāṇamārgasaṃdarśanahetukānām āsaṃgapratibhānas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpanna iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
XXjnalokau:213: sa yad bhāṣate tat sarvaṃ tathāvitathānanyathā, tasya devamanuṣyeṣu tathāgata iti nāma kṛtam
XXjnalokau:214: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ śabdo niścarati devamanuṣyeṣu yaduta tathāgata iti /
XXjnalokau:216: animitto mañjuśrīs tathāgato nimittāpagato na deśastho na
XXjnalokau:218: tat khalu punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatapratibhāsaḥ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ dharmeṇa saṃtarpayitvā
XXjnalokau:219: saṃpravārayitvā, ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ nirvāṇavainayikānāṃ
XXjnalokau:223: na mañjuśrīs tathāgata utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā /
XXjnalokau:227: udakārambaṇenābhūtasya meghasyānutpannāniruddhasyāsato meghaprajñaptiḥ sthitā loke megha iti
XXjnalokau:228: evam eva mañjuśrīr dharmadeśanārambaṇenābhūtasya tathāgatasyānutpannāniruddhasyāsata ādita evājātasya nāmaprajñaptiḥ sthitā loke tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti //
XXjnalokau:231: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīr mahābrahmānabhibhūr daśatrisāhasramahāsāhasravaśavartī divase divase
XXjnalokau:233: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena tasya mahābrahmaṇo daśatrisāhasramahāsāhasravaśavartinaḥ sarvadevanikāyān vyavalokayataḥ,
XXjnalokau:234: sarvadevanikāyeṣu sarvadevaputrāḥ svakasvakān kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāṃs tyaktvā sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītiṃ
XXjnalokau:235: kāmakrīḍāratimanasikārotsṛṣṭāḥ sagauravā añjaliṃ pragṛhya mahābrahmāṇam animiṣaṃ vyavalokayanti
XXjnalokau:236: sa ca mahābrahmā sarvadevanikāyeṣu muhūrtaṃ darśanaṃ dadāti /
XXjnalokau:237: te ca devaputrās tasmin samaye mahābrahmalokopapattim
XXjnalokau:239: sa ca mañjuśrīr mahābrahmācyavamānas tato brahmavimānād anyam adhitiṣṭhati mahābrahmāṇaṃ daśatrisāhasramahāsāhasravaśavartinaṃ pūrvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlopacayena /
XXjnalokau:240: sa ca mañjuśrīr nirmito mahābrahmā divase divase sarvadevanikāyān vyavalokayati, yāvac cāturmahārājakāyikadevanikāyān /
XXjnalokau:241: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena sarveṣu devanikāyeṣu sarvadevaputrāḥ svakasvakān kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāṃs tyaktvā sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītiṃ
XXjnalokau:242: praśamayitvā, kāmakrīḍāratimanasikārotsṛṣṭāḥ sagauravā añjaliṃ pragṛhya mahābrahmāṇam animiṣaṃ vyavalokayanti sma /
XXjnalokau:243: sa ca mahābrahmā sarvadevanikāyeṣu muhūrtaṃ darśanaṃ dadāti, na ca sthānāc calati /
XXjnalokau:244: te ca devaputrās tasmin samaye mahābrahmalokopapattim ākāṅkṣanti,
XXjnalokau:250: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadevanikāyeṣu darśanābhāso bhavati, tasyaiva mahābrahmaṇaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlopacayena /
XXjnalokau:251: na ca mañjuśrīs teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām evaṃ bhavati
XXjnalokau:254: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śūnyo vaśiko
XXjnalokau:257: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
XXjnalokau:259: sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ sarvakuśalamūlādhiṣṭhānena lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtas tathāgataḥ pratibimbam iva loke saṃdṛśyate, na ca sthānāc calati /
XXjnalokau:260: na ca mañjuśrīr ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ caivaṃ bhavati
XXjnalokau:263: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatātmabhāvāl lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtāt sarvatathāgateryāpatheṣu śūnyeṣu nānāvidhivicitrāṇāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahādharmadeśanā niścarati /
XXjnalokau:264: sā ca dharmadeśanā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
XXjnalokau:265: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samayaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
XXjnalokau:266: tad anenāpi te mañjuśrīḥ paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam, anutpādo 'nirodha iti tathāgatasyaitad adhivacanam iti //
XXjnalokau:269: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣat /
XXjnalokau:270: anutpādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ /
XXjnalokau:271: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayo asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke // 1 //
XXjnalokau:272: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
XXjnalokau:273: na cātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke // 2 //
XXjnalokau:276: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo jambūdvīpe pūrvataram eva tāvad mahāśailendrarājānam avabhāsayanti
XXjnalokau:279: tataḥ paścād iha jambūdvīpe nimnān pṛthivīpradeśān avabhāsayanti /
XXjnalokau:280: te ca mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo na kalpayanti, na
XXjnalokau:282: cittamanovijñānāpagatā mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayaḥ, anutpannā aniruddhāḥ, alakṣaṇā lakṣaṇāpagatāḥ,
XXjnalokau:284: aparidāhā niṣparidāhāḥ, naurasthā na parasthāḥ, noccā na nīcāḥ, na baddhā na muktāḥ, na jñānavanto nājñānavantaḥ, na saṃkleśā na niḥkleśāḥ, na satyavādino na mṛṣāvādinaḥ, na tīre na nimne, na sthale naughe, na tarkāvacarā nātarkāvacarāḥ, na rūpiṇo nārūpiṇaḥ /
XXjnalokau:285: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivyām uccanīcamadhyaviśeṣeṇa hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāvabhāsasya cchāyā vaicitryaṃ bhavati /
XXjnalokau:286: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kalpayati, na
XXjnalokau:288: cittamanovijñānāpagato mañjuśrīs tathāgataḥ, anutpanno 'niruddhaḥ, alakṣaṇo lakṣaṇāpagataḥ,
XXjnalokau:289: amanaskāro manaskārāpagataḥ, aprapañcaḥ prapañcāpagataḥ, aparidāho niṣparidāhaḥ /
XXjnalokau:290: naurastho na pārasthaḥ, nocco na nīcaḥ, na baddho na
XXjnalokau:291: muktaḥ, na jñānavān nājñānavān, na saṃkleśo na niḥkleśaḥ, na satyavādī na
XXjnalokau:292: mṛṣāvādī, nāvāre na pāre, na tīre nātīre, na nimne nānimne, na sthale nāsthale, naughe nānoghe, na sarvajño nāsarvajñaḥ, na tarko nātarkaḥ, na pracāro (JĀA 39) nāpracāraḥ, na samudācāro nāsamudācāraḥ, na smṛtimān nāsmṛtimān, na cetano na niścetanaḥ, na mano nāmanaḥ, na nirjāto nānirjātaḥ, na nāmo nānāmaḥ, na rūpo nārūpaḥ, na vyāhāro nāvyāhāraḥ, na prajñapyo nāprajñapyaḥ, na dṛśyo nādṛśyaḥ, na netrī nānetrī, na mārgapraṇetā nāmārgapraṇetā, na prāptaphalo nāprāptaphalaḥ, na kalpo nākalpaḥ, na kalpāpagato nākalpāpagataḥ /
XXjnalokau:293: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalajñānaraśmayas traidhātuke
XXjnalokau:295: prasṛtāś ca raśmayaḥ pūrvataram eva mahāśailendrakalpādhyāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti
XXjnalokau:298: tataḥ paścāt kuśalādhyāśayānāṃ yathādhimuktīnāṃ sattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
XXjnalokau:299: tataḥ paścād antaśo mithyātvaniyateṣu sattvasaṃtāneṣu kāye tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalaraśmayo nipatanti /
XXjnalokau:302: tatra ca tathāgato mañjuśrīḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
XXjnalokau:304: asyāhaṃ sattvasyodāraṃ (JĀA 40) dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi, asya na deśayiṣyāmīti /
XXjnalokau:305: na tasyaivaṃ vikalpo bhavati, ayam udārādhimuktikaḥ sattvaḥ, ayaṃ
XXjnalokau:307: ayaṃ kuśalāśayaḥ, ayaṃ hīno mithyāśaya iti /
XXjnalokau:309: ayam udārāśayādhimuktikaḥ sattvo 'sya mahāyānaṃ deśayiṣyāmi, ayaṃ madhyāśayādhimukto 'sya pratyekabuddhayānaṃ deśayiṣyāmi, ayaṃ śrāvakayānādhimuktiko 'sya śrāvakayānaṃ deśayiṣyāmi kuśalākuśalāśayānāṃ ca sattvānām āśayaṃ viditvā viśodhayiṣyāmi, ṛjukāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ kariṣyāmi /
XXjnalokau:310: yāvad mithyātvaniyatānām api sattvānāṃ yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi /
XXjnalokau:314: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalāśayasaṃtānavaicitryāt tathāgatajñānasūryamaṇḍalaraśmyavabhāsasya vaicitryaṃ bhavati //
XXjnalokau:317: tadyathā mañjuśrīr asti mahāsāgare sarvābhiprāyaparipūraṇaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tad dhvajāgrāvabaddham
XXjnalokau:319: bhavati, tādṛśaṃ tataḥ (JĀA 41) śabdaṃ niścarantaṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
XXjnalokau:320: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na
XXjnalokau:322: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati, na cintyo niścintyaś cittamanovijñānāpagataḥ /
XXjnalokau:324: 'paryavagrāhaḥ, aprāpto 'prāptavyaḥ, praṇunnapratyekasatyaḥ, praṇunnarāgaḥ praṇunnadoṣaḥ praṇunnamohaḥ, na satyo na mṛṣā, na nityo nānityaḥ, na prabho nāprabhaḥ, na loko nālokaḥ, avitarko 'vicāraḥ, anutpanno 'niruddhaḥ
XXjnalokau:326: 'niryūhaḥ, anabhiniveśyaḥ, avyavahāro vyavahārasamucchedaḥ, anānando nirānando nandīsamudghātaḥ, asaṃkhyātaḥ saṃkhyāpagataḥ, agatir agatigāmī sarvagatisamucchinnaḥ, sarvavyāhārasamucchinnaḥ, adṛśyo 'nālokyo 'grāhyaḥ,
XXjnalokau:327: nāvakāśo nānavakāśaḥ, na paśyo na nirdeśyaḥ, na sāmagrī na visāmagrī, na vikalpito nāvikalpitaḥ, aviṭhāpito 'saṃdarśitaḥ, asaṃkliṣṭo
XXjnalokau:328: 'pariśodhanārhaḥ, na nāma na rūpaṃ na nimittam, na karma na karmavipākaḥ,
XXjnalokau:329: nātīto (JĀA 42) nānāgato na pratyutpannaḥ, niṣkiñcanaḥ, araṇaḥ, anakṣaraḥ,
XXjnalokau:332: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatajñānaratnam adhyāśayapariśuddhaṃ mahākaruṇādhvajāgrāvabaddham,
XXjnalokau:333: tato yo yathāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ sa tathā dharmadeśanāṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānāti /
XXjnalokau:334: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ //
XXjnalokau:337: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkām anyarutavijñaptito niścarantīṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
XXjnalokau:338: sā ca nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā, nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā
XXjnalokau:339: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate, notpannā na niruddhā, nocchinnā na śāśvatā,
XXjnalokau:340: na jñānavatī nājñānavatī, na prajñā nāprajñā, na vidyā nāvidyā, na vimuktir nāvimuktiḥ, na sāvadyā na niravadyā, na smṛtir nāsmṛtiḥ, na sthānavatī nāsthānavatī, na niṣadyā nāniṣadyā, na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur
XXjnalokau:341: na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ, na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā, na niṣprapañcā na
XXjnalokau:342: saprapañcā, na (JĀA 43) rutā nārutā, na dṛśyā nādṛśyā, anakṣarā,
XXjnalokau:344: alakṣaṇā lakṣaṇāpagatā, na śāntir nāśāntiḥ, na dīrghā na hrasvā, na cetanā nācetanā, na caityā nācaityā, na lokyā nālokyā, darśanasvabhāvena śūnyāsmṛtir amanasikārā, avitarkā, avicārā, cittamanovijñānāpagatā,
XXjnalokau:346: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkā nānārutaghoṣā nānādhyāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutaghoṣavijñaptito niścarati /
XXjnalokau:348: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nātīto nānāgato na
XXjnalokau:349: pratyutpannaḥ, nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
XXjnalokau:350: notpanno na niruddhaḥ, nocchinno na śāsvataḥ, na jñānavān nājñānavān,
XXjnalokau:351: aprajñāvān nāprajñāvān, na vidyā nāvidyā, na vimuktir nāvimuktiḥ, na sāvadyo na niravadyaḥ, na smṛtimān nāsmṛtimān, na sthānavān nāsthānavān,
XXjnalokau:352: na niṣadyo nāniṣadyaḥ, na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na
XXjnalokau:353: vāyudhātuḥ, na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛtaḥ, na (JĀA 44) prapañco nāprapañcaḥ, na ruto nārutaḥ, na dṛśyo nādṛśyaḥ, anakṣaraḥ, aghoṣo ghoṣasamatikrāntaḥ,
XXjnalokau:354: atulas tulāsamatikrāntaḥ, alakṣaṇo lakṣaṇāpagataḥ, na śānto nāśāntaḥ, na dīrgho na hrasvaḥ, na cetano nācetanaḥ, na caityo nācaityaḥ, na lokyo nālokyaḥ, darśanasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ, asmṛtī, amanasikāraḥ, avitarkaḥ,
XXjnalokau:355: avicāraḥ, cittamanovijñānāpagataḥ, sarvatra samo nirvikalpaḥ, nirviśeṣas tryadhvasamatikramaḥ
XXjnalokau:356: atha ca mañjuśrīr nānāvimuktāḥ sattvā nānādhyāśayavijñaptitas tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti
XXjnalokau:359: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivīṃ niśritya pṛthivīṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
XXjnalokau:360: na mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivī kalpayati, na vikalpayati, sarvatra samā nirvikalpā,
XXjnalokau:362: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvakuśalamūlāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
XXjnalokau:363: śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā mahāyānikānāṃ vā, anyeṣāṃ
XXjnalokau:365: kuśalamūlāni, yāni cānyāny antaśo mithyātvaniyatānāṃ kuśalamūlāni sarvāṇi
XXjnalokau:366: tāni tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
XXjnalokau:367: na ca mañjuśrīs tathāgataḥ kalpayati, na vikalpayati /
XXjnalokau:369: atarkāvacaraḥ, adṛśyaḥ, anālokyaḥ, acintyaḥ, acintanīyaḥ, amanasikāraḥ,
XXjnalokau:374: tadyathā mañjuśrīr ākāśaṃ sarvatra samaṃ nirvikalpaṃ nirviśeṣam,
XXjnalokau:375: anutpannam aniruddham, nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannam, alakṣyam,
XXjnalokau:376: aprapañcam, anirūpi, anidarśanam, avijñapanīyam, asaṃsparśam, aniketam,
XXjnalokau:379: anakṣaram, aghoṣam, amanasikāram, anāyūham (JĀA 46) aniryūham, anikṣepam
XXjnalokau:381: atha mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsthānasya hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭatayākāśaṃ hīnotkṛṣṭaṃ saṃjānanti /
XXjnalokau:382: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvatra samo
XXjnalokau:383: nirviśeṣaḥ, anutpanno 'niruddhaḥ, nātīto nānāgato na pratyutpannaḥ,
XXjnalokau:389: atha ca mañjuśrīr ye hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāśayāḥ sattvās te hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti
XXjnalokau:391: ayaṃ hīnādhyāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya hīnāṃ rūpakāyavarṇapariniṣpattiṃ darśayiṣyāmi
XXjnalokau:392: ayaṃ madhyāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya madhyamāṃ rūpakāyavarṇapariniṣpattiṃ darśayiṣyāmi
XXjnalokau:397: ayaṃ hīnādhimuktaḥ (JĀA 47) sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya hīnāṃ śrāvakayānakathāṃ kariṣye /
XXjnalokau:398: ayaṃ madhyāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya pratyekabuddhayānakathāṃ kariṣye /
XXjnalokau:399: ayam udārāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya mahāyānakathāṃ kariṣye //
XXjnalokau:401: ayam udārādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya dānakathāṃ kariṣye //
XXjnalokau:402: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /
XXjnalokau:404: ayaṃ prajñāpāramitādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ, asya sattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ kathāṃ kathayiṣye
XXjnalokau:411: na mañjuśrīs tathāgatasya nāmarūpaniruktyānusāri vijñānaṃ pravartate /
XXjnalokau:412: na mañjuśrīs tathāgataḥ kalpayati, na vikalpayati /
XXjnalokau:414: sarvadharmasamatākoṭī mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ samaḥ sarvatra nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ, na hīno na madhyo notkṛṣṭaḥ /
XXjnalokau:415: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, nirvikalpā nirviśeṣāḥ, na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭāḥ
XXjnalokau:418: yā mañjuśrīr anupalabdhiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sā samatā, yā samatā sā sthitā, yā sthitā sācalanatā, yācalanatā sāniśrayatā //
XXjnalokau:421: evaṃ darśinaś ca viparyastāc cittacaitasikā na pravartante /
XXjnalokau:425: yadā na pracarati tadā na saṃcarati /
XXjnalokau:426: yadā na saṃcarati tadā na visarati /
XXjnalokau:436: yaś ca niyāmaprāptaḥ sa sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati /
XXjnalokau:437: yadā sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati tadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati /
XXjnalokau:438: yadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati tadā na bhavati na vibhavati /
XXjnalokau:439: yadā na bhavati na vibhavati tadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati
XXjnalokau:440: / yadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati tadā yoniśodharmaprayukto bhavati /
XXjnalokau:441: yoniśodharmaprayuktasya na kaścid dharmo 'sti yo na buddhadharmaḥ /
XXjnalokau:451: na tatra prayogo na pramāṇaṃ na phalasākṣātkriyā /
XXjnalokau:453: prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ tac cāgantukair upakleśair upakliśyate na ca prakṛtiḥ saṃkliśyate
XXjnalokau:455: yā cāsaṃkleśatā tatra pratipakṣo nāsti yena pratipakṣeṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ syāt /
XXjnalokau:457: na śuddhaḥ śudhyati śuddha eva saḥ /
XXjnalokau:460: yaś cāninditaḥ sa nandīprahāṇaṃ tatra sarvasnehā nirudhyante /
XXjnalokau:467: tathatāpratiṣṭhitāś ca sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtāś ca /
XXjnalokau:468: yā ca tathatā na tatra saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ /
XXjnalokau:469: yatra na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ sā tathatā /
XXjnalokau:476: yā najātutathatā sā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate /
XXjnalokau:477: yā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate sā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
XXjnalokau:478: yā notpadyate na nirudhyate sā nirvāṇena samā /
XXjnalokau:479: yā nirvāṇena samā sā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti /
XXjnalokau:480: yā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti sā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā /
XXjnalokau:481: yā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā sā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā /
XXjnalokau:482: yā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā sā tathatā //
XXjnalokau:486: tathaiva tathatā cātmā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
XXjnalokau:496: yad arthānugamajñānaṃ vijñānānugamaṃ cedam ucyate jñānam /
XXjnalokau:501: yārthānugamajñānena vijñānānugamajñānena nītārthānugamajñānena ca sā dharmatā /
XXjnalokau:505: yā dharmasyāpravṛttiḥ, yā cārthavyaṃjanasamatā sādvayārthe samā /
XXjnalokau:506: yā ca samatā so 'rthaḥ, sā cārthajñānena samatā, sādvayamukhapraveśena jñānasamatā //
XXjnalokau:528: tatra bodhisattvena saṃkleśahetur vyavadānahetuś ca parijñātavyaḥ /
XXjnalokau:529: saṃkleśahetuviśuddhyā ca vyavadānaviśuddhyā ca na sthātavyam//
XXjnalokau:550: saṃkṣiptena sarve 'kuśalā manaskārāḥ saṃkleśasya hetuḥ, sarve kuśalā manaskārā vyavadānasya hetuḥ //
XXjnalokau:551: tatra yaḥ saṃkleśasya hetuḥ, yaś ca vyavadānasya hetuḥ, sarve te dharmāḥ
XXjnalokau:552: prakṛtiśūnyā niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā asvāmikā aparigrahā nirvyāpārā māyopamā alakṣaṇā adhyātmopaśāntāḥ /
XXjnalokau:560: sa ākāśasamān sarvadharmān prajānāti, saṃkleśavyavadānena ca vyavaharati, na cākāśadharmatāṃ vijahāti /
XXjnalokau:562: na kaścin mañjuśrīr dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yasyotpādo nirodho vā bhavet //
XXjnalokau:566: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatena bodhiḥ prāptā /
XXjnalokau:570: tatra katamad bhagavan mūlaṃ katamat pratiṣṭhānam /
XXjnalokau:573: tat tathāgatena mañjuśrīr bodhisamatayā sarvadharmasamatā jñātā /
XXjnalokau:574: tasmād ucyate mañjuśrīr amūlāpratiṣṭhānā tathāgatena bodhir abhisaṃbuddheti //
XXjnalokau:581: cakśur mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
XXjnalokau:582: sa cakṣuḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya rūpeṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
XXjnalokau:583: evaṃ śrotraṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
XXjnalokau:584: sa śrotraṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya śabdeṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
XXjnalokau:585: ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti
XXjnalokau:586: / sa ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya gandheṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
XXjnalokau:587: jihvā śūnyātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyā eṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
XXjnalokau:588: sa jihvā śūnyeti parijñāya raseṣu na (JĀA 55) dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
XXjnalokau:589: kāyaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
XXjnalokau:590: sa kāyaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya spraṣṭavyeṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti /
XXjnalokau:591: mano mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca, prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ayam ucyate śama iti /
XXjnalokau:592: sa manaḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya dharmeṣu na dhāvati, tenocyata upaśama iti //
XXjnalokau:606: tathā cāvatārṣīd yathā tathatāyā nāpāraṃ na pāraṃ samanupaśyati /
XXjnalokau:625: yas traidhātuke 'gocaraḥ, ayaṃ mañjuśrīr āryāṇāṃ gocaraḥ //
XXjnalokau:628: bodhir mañjuśrīr nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā tryadhvasamā trimaṇḍalaparicchinnā /
XXjnalokau:633: sa cittamanovijñānāpratiṣṭhito na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
XXjnalokau:634: anavakalpayann avikalpayan nātītaṃ karoty anāgataṃ na manyate pratyutpannaṃ na prapañcayati
XXjnalokau:639: cakṣurvijñānavijñeyā, na śrotra, na ghrāṇa, na jihvā, na kāya, na manovijñānavijñeyā /
XXjnalokau:640: yan mañjuśrīr na cittamanovijñānavijñeyaṃ tad asaṃskṛtam /
XXjnalokau:641: asaṃskṛtam ucyate yatra notpādo na sthitir na vyayaḥ /
XXjnalokau:666: bodhir mañjuśrīr na kāyenābhisambudhyate na cittena /
XXjnalokau:669: / cittaṃ ca māyopamaṃ riktaṃ tuccham abhūtam asaṃskṛtam /
XXjnalokau:670: yo mañjuśrīr evaṃ kāyasya cittasya cāvabodhaḥ, ayam ucyate mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ /
XXjnalokau:673: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kāyena vā cittena vā dharmeṇa vā adharmeṇa vā bhūtena vābhūtena vā satyena vā mṛṣā vā vacanīyā //
XXjnalokau:678: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kiñcit sthānaṃ yena ca vyavahāraṃ gacchet /
XXjnalokau:679: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśasthānam asaṃskṛtam anutpannam aniruddham avacanīyaṃ tathā mañjuśrīr bodhir asaṃskṛtāsthānānutpannāniruddhāvacanīyā /
XXjnalokau:680: yathā mañjuśrīr bhūtaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ sarvadharmair avacanīyam, evam eva mañjuśrīr
XXjnalokau:695: abhisaṃbudhya cakṣuṣo 'nanugrahāya rūpānupalabdhitaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ na pratiṣṭhitam /
XXjnalokau:702: tenāpratiṣṭhitavijñānas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
XXjnalokau:704: katamāni catvāri yad uta rūpaṃ sattvānāṃ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam /
XXjnalokau:705: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam /
XXjnalokau:706: tāni khalu punar imāni mañjuśrīś catvāri cittasya pratiṣṭhānāni tathāgatenānutpannāny aniruddhānīti jñātāni //
XXjnalokau:709: bodhir iti mañjuśrīḥ śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam /
XXjnalokau:710: yayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ śūnyā tayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ /
XXjnalokau:713: api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīr ekanayam etad yad uta śūnyatā vā bodhir vā /
XXjnalokau:714: yatra mañjuśrīr na śūnyatā na bodhiḥ, na tatra mañjuśrīḥ kiṃcid dvayaṃ yena dvayena śūnyatā vā bodhir vā dvidhākriyate /
XXjnalokau:716: advayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā advaidhīkārā anāmāno 'nimittāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anutpannā aniruddhā (JĀA 61)
XXjnalokau:718: yat punar ucyate mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam iti, anabhiniveśagrāhasyaitad adhivacanam /
XXjnalokau:719: na punar atra mañjuśrīḥ paramārthataḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ śūnyam ity ucyate /
XXjnalokau:720: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśam ākāśam ity ucyate, avacanīyam ākāśam /
XXjnalokau:721: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ śūnyaṃ śūnyam ity ucyate,
XXjnalokau:723: anāmakā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmānām ataś ca vyākriyante /
XXjnalokau:724: na mañjuśrīr nāma deśasthaṃ na pradeśasthaṃ /
XXjnalokau:727: 'bhilapyate so 'pi dharmo na deśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
XXjnalokau:728: evam ete mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena jñātā ādita evājātā anutpannā aniruddhā alakṣaṇāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anakṣarā aghoṣāḥ /
XXjnalokau:734: ākāśaṃ ca na samaṃ na (JĀA 62) viṣamaṃ bodhir api na samā na viṣamā /
XXjnalokau:736: yasya mañjuśrīr dharmasya na bhūtapariniṣpattir nāsau samo na viṣamo vā vaktavya iti /
XXjnalokau:737: hi mañjuśrīs tathāgatena sarvadharmā asamā aviṣamā abhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
XXjnalokau:738: tathā cābhisaṃbuddhā athāṇur api na samīkṛto na viṣamīkṛtaḥ /
XXjnalokau:739: yādṛśā eva te dharmāḥ tādṛśā eva vijñātāḥ /
XXjnalokau:740: bhūtajñānena katamac ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ, abhūtvā bhavanti, abhūtvāś ca prati
XXjnalokau:742: te cāsvāmikā aparigrahāḥ saṃbhavanti, asvāmikā aparigrahāś ca mañjuśrīḥ prati vigacchanti
XXjnalokau:743: iti hi mañjuśrīḥ saṃbhavanti vibhavanti ca pratītya dharme vartante na cātra kaścid vartayitā
XXjnalokau:744: tad ucyate dharmopacchedāya tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayatīti //
XXjnalokau:749: mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ, yathā bodhis tathā rūpaṃ tathatān na
XXjnalokau:751: yathā bodhis tathā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ tathatān na vyativartate /
XXjnalokau:752: yathā bodhis tathā pṛthivīdhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
XXjnalokau:753: (JĀA 63) yathā bodhis tathāpdhātus tejodhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
XXjnalokau:754: yathā bodhis tathā cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
XXjnalokau:755: yathā hi mañjuśrīr bodhis tathā śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ
XXjnalokau:757: jihvādhātū rasadhātur jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ, kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ kāyavijñānadhātuḥ, manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātus tathatān na vyativartante /
XXjnalokau:760: sā tathāgatena yathāvadabhisaṃbuddhā yathaiva pūrvāt tathā paścāt tathā madhye /
XXjnalokau:764: yathaikas tathā sarve, yathā sarve tathā caikaḥ /
XXjnalokau:765: na cātra mañjuśrīr ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ copalabhyate //
XXjnalokau:771: ākāro mañjuśrīr ucyata ārambhaḥ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām /
XXjnalokau:787: anāsravatā mañjuśrīr ucyate caturṇām āsravānāṃ vigamaḥ
XXjnalokau:788: / katameṣāṃ caturṇām, yaduta kāmāsravasya, bhavāsravasya, avidyāsravasya,
XXjnalokau:793: śīlavrataparāmarśopādānasya, ātmavādopādānasya ca, eṣāṃ caturṇām upādānānām /
XXjnalokau:806: yac cāvidyāyā asamutthānaṃ tad dvādaśānāṃ bhavāṅgānām asamutthānam /
XXjnalokau:817: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
XXjnalokau:818: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa tathāgataṃ paśyati /
XXjnalokau:819: tathā ca paśyati yathā parigaveṣyamāṇo na kiṃcit paśyati /
XXjnalokau:822: sa yadā na cittam, na cārambaṇaṃ paśyati tadā bhūtam paśyati /
XXjnalokau:823: evam ete dharmās tathāgatena saṃbuddhāḥ samatayā samāḥ //
XXjnalokau:839: ākāśaṃ śuddhiḥ, gaganaṃ vimalam, kham anaṅgaṇam /
XXjnalokau:840: adhyātmaḥ pariśuddhiḥ, bahirdhāpracāro vimalam, adhyātmabahirdhā cānupalabdhir anaṅgaṇam /
XXjnalokau:845: iti hi mañjuśrīḥ śuddhir vimalam anaṅgaṇam ity ekapadesmin samavasaranti /
XXjnalokau:850: yaś copaśamaḥ sa munir ity ucyate /
XXjnalokau:851: iti hi mañjuśrīr yathākāśaṃ tathā bodhiḥ /
XXjnalokau:860: tatra mañjuśrīs tathāgatasyaivaṃrūpān sarvadharmān abhisaṃbuddhasya sattvānāṃ (JĀA 67) ca dhātuṃ vyavalokayataḥ,
XXjnalokau:861: śuddhā vimalā anaṅgaṇā vikrīḍitā nāma sattveṣu mahākaruṇāḥ pravartate //
XXjnalokau:865: yadā mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo na kṣayāya notpādāya nākṣayāya nānutpādāya nānyatkṣīṇakṣayāya ca manyate, atyantānutpādaṃ ca na vikopayati /
XXjnalokau:867: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo 'tītaṃ cittaṃ kṣīṇam iti na carati /
XXjnalokau:868: anāgataṃ cittam asaṃprāptam iti na carati /
XXjnalokau:869: pratyutpannaṃ cittaṃ sthitam iti na carati /
XXjnalokau:871: evaṃ caran mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaś carati bodhisattvacaryāyām /
XXjnalokau:872: dānaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
XXjnalokau:874: śīlaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
XXjnalokau:876: evaṃ kṣāntir bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś ca, vīryaṃ bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś ca, (JĀA 68) dhyānaṃ bodhiḥ sattvāś ca tathāgataś ca, evaṃ prajñā bodhis tathāgataś ca sattvāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
XXjnalokau:877: evaṃ caran mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaś carati bodhisattvacaryāyām /
XXjnalokau:878: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisattvo na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti carati nāśūnyam iti /
XXjnalokau:879: evaṃ caran mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaś carati bodhisattvacaryāyām /
XXjnalokau:882: / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ śūnyam iti carati nāśūnyam iti /
XXjnalokau:883: evaṃ caran mañjuśrīr bodhisattvaś carati bodhisattvacaryāyām /
XXjnalokau:886: sa na kaścin mañjuśrīr dharmo vidyate, yasya parijñānaṃ vā prahāṇaṃ vā bhāvanā vā sākṣātkriyā vā bhavet
XXjnalokau:888: kṣaya ity antakṣaya evāsau, yaś cātyantatatkṣīṇo na sa kṣapayitavyaḥ /
XXjnalokau:892: yaś ca yathāvat kṣayaḥ sa na kasyacit kṣayaḥ /
XXjnalokau:893: yasya na kasyacit kṣayas tad asaṃskṛtam /
XXjnalokau:894: yad asaṃskṛtaṃ tatra notpādo na nirodhaḥ /
XXjnalokau:896: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmadhātuḥ /
XXjnalokau:897: yathā dharmadhātusthitis tathāgatajñānaṃ na pravṛttaṃ na nivṛttam /
XXjnalokau:898: īdṛśena dharmanayapraveśena āsravā notpadyante na nirudhyante /
XXjnalokau:899: āsravakṣaya iti mañjuśrīr vyavahārarutākṣarasaṃketaprajñaptir eṣā nātra kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā //
XXjnalokau:902: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya gāthābhir bhagavatam abhyaṣṭāvīt avarṇaliṅgasaṃsthāna anirodha asaṃbhava /
XXjnalokau:910: sadā samāhitaś cāsi gacchaṃs tiṣṭhaṃ śayann api /
XXjnalokau:912: samaṃ kṣeṣi samaṃ yāsi samatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
XXjnalokau:913: samatāṃ na vikopesi nirālamba namo 'stu te // 6 //
XXjnalokau:942: astīti nocyate 'rthajñaiḥ nāstīty api tu nocyate /
XXjnalokau:946: jitās te mānasā doṣāḥ śārīrāś ca caturvidhāḥ /
XXjnalokau:950: anāsravā te smṛtiḥ sūkṣmā bhūtābhūteṣu tanmayā /
XXjnalokau:953: na cātmaparasaṃjñā te nirālamba namo 'stu te // 26 //
XXjnalokau:956: anārambaṇaṃ ca taccittaṃ svabhāvena na vidyate /
XXjnalokau:960: cittaṃ na labdhaṃ buddhehi atyantāya kadācana /
XXjnalokau:961: sarvadharmā ca sarvajña nirālamba namo 'stu te // 30 //
XXjnalokau:962: māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā māyā caiva na vidyate /
XXjnalokau:965: lokaṃ na ca vikalpeṣi nirālamba namo 'stu te // 32 //
XXjnalokau:967: śūnyaṃ ca śūnyam ākhyāsi nirālamba namo 'stu te // 33 //
XXjnalokau:977: acalaṃ vetsi nirvāṇaṃ nirālamba namo 'stu te // 38 //
XXjnalokau:981: vetsi sarvajña sarvatra nirālamba namo 'stu te // 40 //
XXjnalokau:983: vandāmi tvāṃ daśabala oghatīrṇaṃ vandāmi tvāṃ abhayadadaṃ viśāradam /
XXjnalokau:984: dharmeṣu āveṇikaniścayaṃ gataṃ vandāmi tvāṃ sarvajagasya nāyakam // 1 //
XXjnalokau:985: vandāmi saṃyojanabandhanacchidaṃ vandāmi tvāṃ pāragataṃ sthule sthitam /
XXjnalokau:986: vandāmi tvāṃ khinnajagasya nāyakaṃ vandāmi saṃsāragata-ṃ-aniśritam // 2 //
XXjnalokau:988: jale ruhaṃ vā salilair na lipyase niṣevitā te munir buddha śūnyatā // 3 //
XXjnalokau:989: vivekatā śāstṛpadaṃ niruttaraṃ vande nirālamba mahaughatīrṇam /
XXjnalokau:990: vibhāvitā sarvanimitta sarvaśo na te kahiṃcit praṇidhānu vidyate // 4 //
XXjnalokau:991: acintiyaṃ buddha mahānubhāvaṃ vandāmi ākāśasamam aniśritam /
XXjnalokau:992: vandāmi te sarvaguṇāgradhāri vandāmi tvāṃ merum ivodgataśriyam // 5 //
XXjnalokau:995: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāram adāt /
XXjnalokau:998: mañjuśrīr na buddhā rūpato draṣṭavyā na dharmato na lakṣaṇato na dharmadhātutaḥ /
XXjnalokau:1000: na buddhā kenacid dṛṣṭāḥ, na śrutā na pūjitā na pūjyante /
XXjnalokau:1001: na buddhā kasyacid dharmasya ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā kurvanti /
XXjnalokau:1004: na buddhaiḥ kaścid dharmo dṛṣṭo na śruto na smṛto na vijñāto nājñātaḥ /
XXjnalokau:1005: na buddhair bhāṣitaṃ nodāhṛtam, na buddhā bhāṣanti nodāharanti, na buddhā bhāṣiṣyanti nodāhariṣyanti
XXjnalokau:1006: na buddhā abhisaṃbudhyanti, na buddhaiḥ kaścid dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
XXjnalokau:1007: na buddhānāṃ kleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ, na vyavadānaṃ sākṣātkṛtam /
